      • getPortMetainfo

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getPortMetainfo()
        This method returns the meta information assigned to a port. The result is a map. The keys are names of topics assigned to the port. They refers to a detailed description of the port features.
        Returns:
        the meta information assigned to the port. The returned map may be empty, if there is no meta information assigned to the port, but the result will never be null.
